item.title: Report X-2024072403
item.description:
Report X-2024072403

Identified by scraper @ 2024-08-07T15:13:00+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-07-30
  • City: KEASBEY
  • State: NJ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Federal Express Corporation
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: UPON INSPECTION OF INNER CONTENTS DURING THE TWILIGHT SHIFT 1X1GALLON (PLASTIC BOTTLE) BULK PEROXIDE HYDROGEN PEROXIDE 34.5% FG WITH A LOOSE CAP CAUSED LEAKAGING ALLOWING 2 OUNCES OF SPILLAGE FROM BOTTLES. WHICH ALSO CAUSED DAMAGE TO THE OUTER PACKAGING AS WELL.FACILITY PROCEDURES FOR DAMAGED HAZARDOUS MATERIAL FOLLOWED, CONTENTS CONTAINED AND AWAITING DISPOSITION

item.title: Report X-2024072394
item.description:
Report X-2024072394

Identified by scraper @ 2024-08-07T15:13:00+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-07-30
  • City: KEASBEY
  • State: NJ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: 1. X-2024072394 IT APPEARS THE SHIPMENT WAS REMOVED FROM SYSTEM FLOW, DUE TO EXTERNAL CARTON BEING TORN AND WET DURING THE DAY SORT. UPON INSPECTION OF INNER CONTENTS DURING THE TWILIGHT SHIFT 4X1GALLON (PLASTIC BOTTLES) ZEP CONCENTRATED CALCIUM, LIME & RUST STAIN REMOVER WITH A LOOSE CAPS CAUSED LEAKAGING ALLOWING 20 OUNCES OF SPILLAGE FROM BOTTLES. WHICH ALSO CAUSED DAMAGE TO THE OUTER PACKAGING AS WELL.FACILITY PROCEDURES FOR DAMAGED HAZARDOUS MATERIAL FOLLOWED, CONTENTS CONTAINED AND AWAITING DISPOSITION. 2. X-2024072468 attachment Name:2866-ZEP CALCIUM LIME AND RUST.pdf

item.description:

  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0

  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: 1. X-2024072311 One missing gallon seems to be the root cause of the spill. The damages to the fiberboard box were minimal. There were no other reports or damages concerning the spill. 2. X-2024072312 It was a minor spill that caused damages to the fiberboard box. Approximately 0.25lg leaked out form one of the gallon bottles. There were no other damages reported on said spill
